title: #41 - 2HYPE Reveal Why They Quit NBA 2K & Collabing with Sidemen + Dude Perfect
itunes:title: #41 - 2HYPE Reveal Why They Quit NBA 2K & Collabing with Sidemen + Dude Perfect
description: Coming off of one of the largest announcements in 100 Thieves' history, Kristopher London (LSK) and Jesse (Jesser) of 2HYPE step into the studio to discuss the history of 2HYPE, their rise on YouTube and how this dream partnership came to be. The group discuss the state of 2K, their dream collabs (with some interesting promises from Nadeshot), Jesser's disastrous basketball injury, and how they barely got their hands on rare, elusive 100 Thieves diamond chains.
